name: One World Sync Connector
description: A Salsify connector service that relays messages between 1WorldSync and Dandelion. Handles product data synchronization via AS2 protocol, generates target schemas for GDSN compliance, and processes publish requests for product information exchange with 1WorldSync's data pool.

name: 1WorldSync (Abbreviation)
description: Common abbreviation for 1WorldSync used throughout Salsify codebases and documentation. 1WorldSync is a product data management company that provides data synchronization services via the GDSN network.

name: Applicability Statement 2
description: A specification for Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) between businesses using HTTP/S protocol. Used by the con-one-world-sync connector to securely exchange messages with 1WorldSync. Requires certificate management for both Salsify and 1WS partner certificates.

name: Item Management
description: 1WorldSync's Item Management system and data format. The IM Participant Dictionary defines the schema and validations for product data exchange. Salsify uses IM version files (e.g., IM8.41) to generate target schemas and models for the 1WS connector.

name: Message Router 3
description: 1WorldSync's message routing system used for GDSN data synchronization. The destination queue '1WorldSync.MR3' and connector 'Salsify.1WorldSync.MR3' are used in publish request payloads to route product data through 1WorldSync's infrastructure.
